tribunal.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a type of court that is given official authority to deal with a particular situation or problem
tribunal.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The case of your redundancy will be heard by an independent tribunal.

tribunal.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The case of your redundancy  (=loss of your job) will be heard by an  independent tribunal.
